[Please give details regarding your treatment] a) Do you take tablets? If Yes, please give the name of the tablets

[Regarding the monitoring of your conditions] c) When was your last consultation?
[Regarding the monitoring of your conditions] d) How often do you test your blood or urine for Glucose? Daily,Weekly,None

[Regarding the monitoring of your conditions] e) Please indicate your usual test results by circling as appropriate. Blood glucose Below 140 / 140 to 180 / 181 or more. Urine glucose - Negative / + / +++ or more
[Regarding the monitoring of your conditions] f) Please give dates and results of your last two HbA1c (Glycoslated Hemoglobin) tests, if known
Since your treatment began, have your ever had a diabetic (Hyper glycemic) or insulin (Hypoglycemic) coma. If yes, please give complete details including dates.

Have you lost time off work with diabetes or associatedconditions? if Yes please give details including date are duration of time off work.
